youtube.title: What Happens When You Don't Replace a Missing Tooth?
youtube.description: Learn how tooth loss leads to shifting teeth and bone loss. This 3D animation shows the chain reaction caused by a single missing tooth and why dental implants or bridges are essential for oral health. Subscribe for more biology and dental facts!
